ARG FROM=amazonlinux:2
FROM ${FROM}

COPY qemu-* /usr/bin/

ARG DEBUG

RUN \
  quiet=$([ "${DEBUG}" = "yes" ] || echo "--quiet") && \
  yum update -y ${quiet} && \
  yum install -y ${quiet} yum-utils yum-config-manager && \
  yum-config-manager --enable epel && \
  yum groupinstall -y ${quiet} "Development Tools" && \
  yum install -y ${quiet} \
    libedit-devel \
    ncurses-devel \
    libyaml-devel \
    git \
    cyrus-sasl-devel \
    nss-softokn-freebl-devel \
    pkg-config \
    rpm-build \
    rpmdevtools \
    redhat-rpm-config \
    openssl-devel \
    tar \
    zlib-devel \
    rpmlint \
    cmake3 && \
  amazon-linux-extras install ruby2.6 && \
  # raise IPv4 priority
  echo "precedence ::ffff:0:0/96 100" > /etc/gai.conf && \
  # enable multiplatform feature
  gem install --no-document bundler && \
  yum clean ${quiet} all && rm -rf /var/cache/yum
